meanings.definition: Decay or decompose through the action of bacteria or fungi.
meanings.sent1: The fruit was slowly rotting on the kitchen counter.
meanings.sent2: Leaves on the ground were rotting away, returning to the earth.
meanings.sent3: The forgotten sandwich in the backpack was now a rotting surprise.
meanings.sent4: Neglect can lead to relationships rotting like old wood.
meanings.sent5: The smell of rotting garbage filled the alleyway.

meanings.definition: The process of decaying or decomposing.
meanings.sent1: The rotting of the fallen tree attracted insects and fungi.
meanings.sent2: The smell in the cellar was a sign of the rotting of the vegetables.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled at the sight of the rotting pumpkin on the porch.
meanings.sent4: The city had to address the issue of rotting waste in the streets.
meanings.sent5: The rotting of the old shipwreck was a reminder of the passage of time.
